name: Very simple sticky notes
description:
Post-it like notes, sticky notes that are simple enough to be used in a simple and straightforward way. Notes are auto-layout adaptable.


The Very simple sticky notes kit contains:


Variants

Sizing variants of the main component:

  • Auto-height (fixed width, default)
  • Manual resize (fixed)
  • Auto resize (auto)


Styles

  • 5 Colors background styles
  • 3 Shadow styles


Optional hidden layers

  • Title
  • 3 Tags
  • Name
  • Date


Font used as base font is Inter.
